components.text:
[center][b][size=14][color=#<%= colorschema_background_freetext %>]Selected unwanted sequence of two activities:

<%=Sequence_Start%> --> <%=Sequence_Stop%>[/color][/size][/b][/center]

components.componentFilter: FILTER PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> OR  PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO ANY TO <%= Sequence_Stop %>;
components.title: <%= Sequence_Start %> followed by  <%= Sequence_Stop %>

meta.expressionLhs: CASE WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10 THEN YEAR ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) + CASE WHEN MONTH ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END || '-CW-' || CALENDAR_WEEK ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ELSE YEAR ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) || '-CW-0' || CALENDAR_WEEK ( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) END AS "Timeframe" FORMAT "%Y-%m"

axis2.name: Wrong Sequence
axis2.text:
100.0*(COUNT(DISTINCT 
   CASE WHEN PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> OR 
             PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO ANY TO <%= Sequence_Stop %>
            
            THEN  "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)
/ 

COUNT(DISTINCT "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY"))

components.title: # <%= CASE_ITEM %>s with <%= Sequence_Start %> followed by <%= Sequence_Stop %> by <%=TIMEFRAME_TEXT%>

axis0.name: <%= ButtonDrilldown3_text%>
axis0.translatedName: <%=  ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."MATKL" || \' - \' || "EKPO"."MATKL_TEXT"'  ? 'Material Group':    ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."BUKRS" || \' - \' || "EKPO"."BUKRS_TEXT"'  ? 'Company Code':    ButtonDrilldown3 == '"LFA1"."LIFNR" || \' - \' || "LFA1"."NAME1"'  ? 'Vendor':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."MATNR" || \' - \' || "EKPO"."MATNR_TEXT"'  ? 'Material':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKKO"."EKORG" || \' - \' || "EKKO"."EKORG_TEXT"'  ? 'Purch. Organization':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKKO"."BSART" || \' - \' || "EKKO"."BSART_TEXT"'  ? 'Purchasing Doc. Type': ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."MANDT"'  ? 'Client':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."EBELN"'  ? 'Purchasing Document':   ButtonDrilldown3 == '"EKPO"."EBELP"'  ? 'Item Number':   ButtonDrilldown3 == 'CASE WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") >= 0 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 100 THEN \'a) 0 - 100€\' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 100 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 500 THEN \'b) 100 - 500€\' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 500 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 1000 THEN \'c) 500 - 1.000€\' WHEN PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 1000 AND PU_SUM("EKKO","EKPO"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 10000 THEN \'d) 1.000 - 10.000€\' ELSE \'e) > 10.000€\' END'  ? 'Purchase Order Amount':   ''%>

axis2.name: # <%= CASE_ITEM %>s with Sequence
axis2.text:
COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN process EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> OR 
             process EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO ANY TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> 
             THEN "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)

axis2.name: Wrong Sequence Rate
axis2.text:
(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> OR 
             PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO ANY TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> THEN "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)
/ 
COUNT(DISTINCT "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY"))

components.title: Activity Sequence <%= Sequence_Start %> followed by <%= Sequence_Stop %>

formula.text:
COUNT(DISTINCT 
   CASE WHEN PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO <%= Sequence_Stop %> OR 
             PROCESS EQUALS <%= Sequence_Start %> TO ANY TO <%= Sequence_Stop %>
            
            THEN  "_CEL_<%= process %>_ACTIVITIES"."_CASE_KEY" ELSE NULL END)

components.title: # <%= CASE_ITEM %>s with <%= Sequence_Start %> followed by <%= Sequence_Stop %>

components.message:
General Information

#{This Sheet offers the opportunity to investigate user-specified wrong activity sequences. }

KPI Definition

#{#SO Items with Activity A followed by Activity B: }
#{Number of Purchase Order Items where a user-specified Activity Sequence has happened. }

#{Wrong Sequence Rate: }
#{Share of Purchase Order Items, in which a user-specified Missing Activity has happened.}

variables.name: filter6
variables.value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END

variables.name: filter7
variables.value:
CASE WHEN ISNULL("EKPO"."LOEKZ") = 1 THEN 'not deleted'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'S' THEN 'locked'
     WHEN "EKPO"."LOEKZ" = 'L' THEN 'deleted'
     ELSE "EKPO"."LOEKZ"
END

variables.name: activities_used_in_automation_rate

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (10,11,12) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q1'
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (1,2,3) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q2'
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (4,5,6) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) || ' - Q3'
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") IN (7,8,9) THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || ' - Q4'
ELSE NULL
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") ||'-' || MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT")
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") ||'-0' || MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE
WHEN CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT") >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT")
--- ADD one Year if we are already in CW 1 at the end of December
+ CASE WHEN MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT") = 12 AND CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT") = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END
|| '-CW-' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT")
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT") || '-CW-0' ||CALENDAR_WEEK("VBAK"."ERDAT")
END

variables.title: TIMEFRAME
variables.variableValue:
CASE -- 2 digit Month
WHEN MONTH( "VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN CASE
WHEN DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
END
ELSE CASE
WHEN DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) >= 10
THEN YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
ELSE YEAR("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0'|| MONTH("VBAK"."ERDAT" ) ||'-0' || DAY("VBAK"."ERDAT" )
END
END

variables.title: ButtonDrilldown3
variables.variableValue: CASE WHEN PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") >= 0 AND PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 100 THEN 'a) 0 - 100€' WHEN PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 100 AND PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 500 THEN 'b) 100 - 500€' WHEN PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 500 AND PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 1000 THEN 'c) 500 - 1.000€' WHEN PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") > 1000 AND PU_SUM("VBAK","VBAP"."NETWR_CONVERTED") <= 10000 THEN 'd) 1.000 - 10.000€' ELSE 'e) > 10.000€' END
